articles.title: Still in the throes of Covid, India emerges as one of Asia's top stock markets in May - CNBC
articles.description: India's Nifty 50 rose 6.5% while the BSE Sensex was up 6.47% for the month of May.
articles.content:
India stocks were among Asia-Pacific's top-performing markets in May, even as the country continues to grapple with tens of thousands of new cases every day.
